comments.author: Marissa Stein
comments.content:
I just read an article on this place...seems like it is copying Tamarind Tree. http://www.seattleweekly.com/2008-04-16/food/jasmine-provincial-vietnamese-restaurant-learning-from-the-master.php

My favorite Vietnamese place in town is Green leaf. They have an absolutely incredibly Vegetarian Bun and the fresh rolls...well...I think about them daily.
